content:
Q: How do I make a claim?
A: You can submit the claim form, along with the supporting documents by fax at 6224 1923 or email at claims@hlas.com.sg. Alternatively, you can post it to HL Assurance office at 11 Keppel Road #11-01 ABI Plaza Singapore 089057.
questions: What is the process for making a claim?
Where can I send my claim form?

What is the email address for claims submission?
Can I submit my claim through multiple methods?
What should I do if I have questions about my claim?
Is there a specific format for the claim form?
